name: Cloud Torrent
short_description: Self-hosted torrent client with web UI and streaming download support.
description: Cloud Torrent is a simple, self-hosted torrent client with a clean web interface. Features include torrent upload, magnet link support, download progress, file selection, streaming for partial downloads, and automatic cleanup. Lightweight and easy to use for basic torrent downloading needs.
usecases: Download torrents through a simple web interface.
